mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(board_no, cate_type, user_id, board_title, board_content, file_name, original_file_name, file_size, nickname, pwd) values(#{boardNo}, #{cateType},#{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{fileName}, #{originalFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{nickname}, #{pwd})
mapper.select: select pwd from board where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set down_count=down_count+1 where board_no=#{boardNo}
